column1: 1. Replace sample figures with your actual business numbers
2. Update income categories based on your revenue streams
3. Modify expense categories to match your business type
4. Use this for monthly planning and comparison with actuals
5. Net Profit = Total Income - Total Expenses
- All amounts are in Indian Rupees
- GST calculations are estimates - consult your CA
- Review and update monthly for best results
- Keep supporting documents for all entries
